Version control with Git

This document provides an overview of the basics of version control using Git, including how to create and manage local repositories, track changes, commit changes, and work with branches and tags. A 30-day free trial is available at www.git-tower.com.

Key Concepts:

  • Git version control workflow
  • Repository management
  • Branching and merging
  • Tagging and publishing
git version control clone init status diff add commit log branch
